instructions: Open Control Center , then turn on airplane mode. Tap the Wi-Fi Switch button (for Wi-Fi) or the Bluetooth Switch button (for Bluetooth). If you turn on Wi-Fi or Bluetooth while in airplane mode, it will be on the next time you return to airplane mode. You can turn it off again in Control Center.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . Tap Games and then Top charts and then Top Free .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . Tap Books . Swipe left and tap Top Free .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . Tap Books . Select the book you want to sample. If available, touch Free Sample .
